#summary truncate(text[length,truncateString])
#labels api,0.8,view,helper

_*Note:* This wiki contains "bleeding edge" documentation, which may reflect a future version of Wheels. Entries in the wiki may also be incomplete and unedited. For the "official" documentation, please visit [http://www.cfwheels.com/docs Official ColdFusion on Wheels Documentation]._

*Description*:

Truncates text to the specified length and replaces the last characters with the specified truncate string (defaults to '...').

*Return Type*:

String

*

*Parameters*:

||   || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *text* || string || true ||  || The text to truncate. ||
|| *length* || numeric || false || 30 || Length to truncate the text to. ||
|| *truncateString* || string || false || ... || String to replace the last characters with. ||



*Examples*:

{{{
#truncate(text="Wheels is a framework for ColdFusion", length=20)#
-> Wheels is a frame...
}}}

{{{
#truncate(text="Wheels is a framework for ColdFusion", truncateString=" (more)")#
-> Wheels is a fra... (continued)


}}}
